Mary McAllister https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_McAllister 0 Mary McAlister, also known as Little Mary McAlister, (May 27, 1909 – May 1, 1991) was an American silent film actress of Hollywood's early years, and a pioneer of child actors. Mary_McAlister , also_known as Little_Mary_McAlister , ( May_27_,_1909 – May_1_,_1991 ) was an_American_silent_film_actress of Hollywood 's_early_years , and a_pioneer of child_actors .
